document_data.name: Tamadanther
document_data.mainbody: '''Tamadanther''' was a [[War Wizard]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Tamdanther usually took the guard shifts immediately after [[Pheldemar]]'s while protecting the hideout of the retired [[Royal Magician of Cormyr]], [[Vangerdahast]], near [[Mouth o' Gargoyles]] in {{yearlink|1373}}.
